tuv.seg: If you have finished your secondary education and would like to develop vocational and technological skills in order to get a job or to go into further education and training, the Post-Leaving Certificate (PLC) course may be the one you are looking for

Má tá do chuid oideachais méanscolaíochta críochnaithe agat, agus go dtaitneodh leat scileanna teicneolaíochta agus gairmeacha a fhorbairt, chun post a fháil nó chun dul níos faide san oideachais agus traenáil, b'fhéidir gurb é an Cúrsa Iar Ard-Teistiméireachta (CIAT) atá á lorg agat
The PLC is often seen just as a course for school-leavers. In fact, you will be also welcomed as an adult participant
Ceapann a lán daoine gur cúrsa é seo le haghaidh daoine atá ag fágail na scoile ach i ndáirire tá fáilte roimh dhaoine fásta
A participant contribution of €200 per year (pdf) is charged for PLC students
Beidh muirear rannphairtíochta €200 in aghaidh na bliana (pdf) le n-íoc i leith cúrsaí CIAT ón bhliain 2011/2012 amach
There are some exemptions to this contribution - see 'Rates' below
Tá díolúintí on mhuirear seo i gcásanna áirithe - féach 'Rátaí' thíos
PLC courses take place in schools, colleges and community education centres
Bíonn na cúrsaí Iar Ard-Teistiméireachta seo ar siúl sna scoileanna, coláistí agus ionaid oideachais phobail ar fud na tíre
The courses are full-time and last for one to two years
Is cúrsaí lán-aimsearatha iad a sheasann idir bliain agus dhá bhliain
They offer a mixture of practical work, academic work and work experience
Tairiscíonn siad meascán de obair phraiticiúil, obair acadúil, agus taithí oibre
They are designed as a step towards skilled employment and, as such, they are closely linked to industry and its needs
Ceapadh iad mar choiscéim i dtreo fostaíocht oillte agus, dhá bhrí sin, tá siad nascaithe go dlúth le tionsclaíocht agus a cuid riachtanaisí
Post Leaving Certificate courses adopt an integrated approach, focusing on technical knowledge, core skills and work experience
Tá cur chuige comhtháite ag cúrsaí Iar Ardteistiméireachta, a dhíríonn ar eolas teicniúil, bunscileanna agus taithí oibre
Almost half of the time spent on these courses is devoted to knowledge and skill training related to employment, with a further quarter spent on relevant work-based experience
Caitear beagnach leath den am ar na cúrsaí seo ag plé le traenáil eolais agus scileanna a bhaineann le fostaíocht, caitear ceathrú eile den am le taithí chuí oibre
Most PLC courses are delivered by Education and Training Boards (ETBs)
Is iad na Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO) a chuireann an cuid is mó de na cúrsaí iar ardteistiméireachta ar fáil

A wide range of disciplines are covered including business, electronics engineering, computing, catering, sport and leisure, theatre and stage, performance art, art craft and design, equestrian studies, multi-media studies, journalism, tourism, marketing, childcare and community care, hairdressing and beauty care, applied science, horticulture etc

Tá réimse leathan ábhar dhá chlúdach ina measc tá, Gnó, Innealtóireacht Leictreonacha, Ríomhaireacht, Lónadóireacht, Spórt agus Siamsaíocht, Amharclann agus Stáitse, Ealaín Léirithe, Ealaín, Ceardaíocht agus Dearadh, Staidéir na nEach, Staidéir Ilmheán, Iriseoireacht, Turasóireacht, Margaíocht, Cúram Leanaí agus Cúram Pobail, Gruagaireacht agus Cúram Áilleachta, Eolaíocht Fheidhmeach, Gairneoireacht
See 'How to apply' below for a link to Qualifax, the national learners' database, where you can search for PLC courses
Féach 'Conas iarratas a dhéanamh' thíos
The qualification you receive at the end of your training will depend on the type of course you have chosen
Braitheann an cháilíocht a bheas agat ag deireadh do chuid traenáil ar an gcinéal cúrsa a rinne tú

Many of the 1-year PLC courses offer Quality and Qualifications Ireland (QQI) accreditation at level 5 on the National Framework of Qualifications, while other more advanced courses may offer QQI level 6, which can lead to further studies at third level

Tairiscíonn go leor da na cúrsaí bliana seo creidiúint ó Dearbhú Cáilíochta agus Cáilíochtaí Éireann (DCCE) ag leibhéal 5 ar an gCreat Náisiúnta Cáilíochtaí (CNC), cé go dtairiscíonn cuid eile creidiúint DCCE ag leibhéal 6, a d'fhéadfadh duine a stiurú chun níos mó staidéir ag an triú leibhéal a dhéanamh
Other qualifications such as City and Guilds are also available
Tá cáilíochtaí eile mar CITY AND GUILDS ar fáil chomh maith
It is important to check out the qualification attached to a particular course before you decide to enrol
Tá sé tábhachtach go seiceálfadh tú an cháilíocht a bhaineann le cúrsa, sula gcláraíonn tú ann
Changes to Vocational Educational Committees (VECs)
Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna
Since 1 July 2013, Education and Training Boards (ETBs) replaced Vocational Educational Committees (VECs)
Ó 1 Iúil 2013, cuirfear Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO) in áit coistí gairmoideachais
All services provided by VECs will continue to be provided by ETBs
Aistrítear ionaid oiliúna FÁS chuig BOO freisin
In general, you should have finished your secondary education and taken your Leaving Certificate examination in order to be eligible for a PLC course
Go ginearálta, ba cheart go mbeadh scrúdú na hArdteistiméireachta déanta agat agus tú críochnaithe le oideachas na meán scoile, chun a bheith i dteideal cúrsa Iar Ardteistiméireachta
However, if you have work experience relevant to the course on offer or think you can demonstrate a particular ability in that area, you should write to the college where the course will take place
Má tá taithí oibre cuí agat don chúrsa atá dá thairiscint áfach, agus go bhfuil ábaltacht agat sa réimse sin, ba cheart duit scríobh chuig an coláiste ina bhfuil na cúrsaí ar siúl
Explain your circumstances in the letter and ask to meet the co-ordinator of the course
Mínigh do chás i litir agus labhair le comhordanóir an chúrsa
You may be eligible for a means-tested student grant or a Back to Education Allowance, depending on your circumstances
B'fhéidir go mbeidh tú i dteideal Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas nó deontas cothabhála a fháil - braitheann sé ar do chúinsí féin
Our document on Grants for students in further and higher education describes who qualifies for a grant and how to apply
Déanann ár ndoiciméad ar dheontais chothabhála cur síos ar na rialacha agus ar chonas iarratas a dhéanamh
Up to the academic year 2011/2012, Irish nationals and nationals of other EU member states did not have to pay tuition fees for approved PLC courses
Roimh an bhliain 2011/2012, níor gá do shaoránaigh Éireannacha ná do shaoránaigh an Aontais Eorpaigh táillí a íoc i leith cúrsaí Iar Ardteistiméireachta
Some other categories of students were also entitled to access them free of fees - see studentfinance.ie for details
D'fhéadadh catagóirí eile mac léinn freastal orthu saor ó tháillí freisin - féach ar studentfinance.ie
A participant contribution of €200 per year was introduced in the academic year 2011/2012
Beidh muirear rannphairtíochta €200 in aghaidh na bliana le n-íoc i leith cúrsaí CIAT ón bhliain 2011/2012 amach
You do not have to pay the contribution if:
Ní gá duit an muirear seo a íoc má:
• You hold a full medical card in your own right
• Tá láncharta leighis agat féin
• You are the dependent child of a full medical card holder
• Is páiste clethiúnach tú le duine a bhfuil láncharta leighis aige/aici
• You are eligible for a student grant
• Tá tú i dteideal díolúíne a fháil faoin Scéim um Dheontais Chothabhála maoinithe do mhic léinn a dhéanann freastal ar chúrsaí Iar-Ardteistiméireachta
• You are getting Back to Education Allowance or a VTOS allowance
• Tá tú ag fáil Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas nó Liúntas faoin Scéim Deiseanna Oiliúna Gairmoideachais
Colleges offering PLC courses usually also have a 'course charge' to cover such expenses as books, uniforms, student services, professional registration fees and exam fees
Gearrann gach coláiste muirear chúrsa freisin, de ghnáth
The amount varies from college to college
Braitheann méid an mhuirir seo ar an gcoláiste féin
Students who are exempted from the participant contribution will still have to pay the course charge
Beidh ort an muirear chúrsa a íoc, fiú má fuair tú díolúine ón mhuirear rannphairtíochta
Use the national learners' database qualifax.ie to find the course in which you are most interested. Apply directly to the school or college offering that course
Faigh an cúrsa a bhfuil suim agat ann agus déan d'iarratas díreach chuig an scoil nó coláiste ina bhfuil na cúrsaí ar siúl
Because the courses are work-related, you will probably be called for an interview before a final selection is made
De bhrí go bhfuil na cúrsaí seo bunaithe ar obair, is dóigh go nglaofar ort chuig agallamh sula ndéantar an roghnú deireanach
These interviews are often quite informal and offer you the opportunity to discuss your particular interest in the course
Is iondúil go mbíonn na hagallaimh seo neamh-fhoirmiúil agus go dtugann siad seans duit do chuid tuairimí a chuir in iúl dóibh
